explanation: [0-0] On a green field, two young men are playing a game. One man wearing a red T-shirt stands on the goal line with his back to the goal, holding cards in both hands. The other man, wearing a fluorescent green T-shirt, stands in front of the goal with a red ball at his feet. The caption "Guess Wrong=Redass⚽️🤣" appears on the screen in black letters on a white background.
